mapper.select:
SELECT RYID,CLJD,ORGID,PZR,PZSJ,RYBH,PZSJ CZSJ,ID FROM T_RY_RYCLXX where ORGID like '110105%'
and PZSJ > to_date(#{pzsj} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT aj.AJBH,aj.AJMC,aj.AJZT,aj.ZBMJ,aj.ZBMJCODE ZH, aj.CBDW ,aj.CBDW ZBDW ,aj.SLSJ,aj.FAKSSJ AFSJ,aj.JYAQ,aj.FADDXZ, jj.JJBH FROM T_AJ_XZAJFAXX aj left join T_AJ_JJAJGLXX jj on aj.ajbh = jj.asjbh where aj.CBDW like '110105%'
and aj.SLSJ > to_date(#{SLSJ} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT aj.AJBH,aj.AJMC,aj.AJZT,aj.CBR ZBMJ,aj.CBRZH ZH, aj.CBDW ,aj.CBDW ZBDW ,aj.SLSJ,aj.FAKSSJ AFSJ,aj.JYAQ,aj.FADDXZ, jj.JJBH FROM T_AJ_XSAJFAXX aj left join T_AJ_JJAJGLXX jj on aj.ajbh = jj.asjbh where aj.CBDW like '110105%'
and aj.SLSJ > to_date(#{SLSJ} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
